N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.3 - Distribution of aid

State Regulations

In determining the distribution of aid pursuant to

Education Law, section 140(8)(c), the commissioner shall allocate at least
$50,000 to each regional advisory and assistance agency receiving aid. The
amount remaining after such distribution shall be distributed to each regional
advisory and assistance agency receiving aid as follows: (a) One-sixth of such remaining amount shall
be distributed to each such agency on a pro rata basis, with the pro rata share
to be computed in accordance with the ratio which the number of square miles of
the area served by the agency bears to the total number of square miles served
by all regional advisory and assistance agencies receiving aid. (b) Five-sixths of such remaining amount
shall be distributed to each such agency on a pro rata basis, with the pro-rata
share to be computed in accordance with the ratio which the population served
by the agency bears to the total population served by all regional advisory and
assistance agencies receiving aid. Notes
